scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: echo "⚠️  Run backend and frontend in separate terminals:\n  Terminal 1: npm run dev --prefix backend\n  Terminal 2: npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --prefix backend && npm run type-check --prefix frontend
